body:
I just recently saw this anime and, damn. It just went from bad to cringe and worse. But the action scenes were pretty good, and if they`re not talking about the forced "romance"parts, it was kinda good. Talking about forced romance parts, i would expect that there would be atleast some NTR or rape hentai from this show. Kinda disappointed, since in the end it looked like pretty much a NTR story. But then again, it`s not like they`re superhot, so we`re not really missing much.
Also @SYNDIKATE, i`ve a feeling you either didn`t watch much anime at all, or are way too young to have been here. But you might be old enough now(hopefully), so your tastes probably have changed too.
O shit here comes Ohagi man
Does the manga have sae in it?
Yep,this was insanely good. Also want that second season, can’t wait; if it does come.
Ohagi man. O h a g i. I like mayura more
Muy buen doujinshi, pero prefiero el manga antes que el anime, en el manga no esta ese zorrillo molesto xD
Syndikate please read the manga it's muuuuuuch better than the anime

I will die a happy man if there is gonna be a season 2 of Twin Star Exorcists and binge watch it every episode of it! This is legitimately my all time Favorite anime, next to My Hero Academia and Fairy Tail
One year too late, it lost the novelty
